workItems.title: Freelance
workItems.description: Making super cool large scale digital marketing websites. Various MVC frameworks, Content Management Systems and multiple languages. Making weird robots.

workItems.title: A Voice for the Innocent
workItems.description: Responsible for creating and executing effective campaigns and partnerships that further the mission of an anti-sexual violence non-profit.

workItems.title: Girl Develop It
workItems.description: I"ve been working to help Girl Develop It students learn various web technologies since 2012. Through GDI, Ive developed a love of teaching and am humbled to be able to participate.
